meanings.sent1: The fewness of apples in the basket surprised me.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the fewness of distractions in this quiet room.
meanings.sent3: The fewness of cookies left in the jar made me sad.
meanings.sent4: The fewness of stars in the sky on a cloudy night is disappointing.
meanings.sent5: The fewness of colors in the painting created a striking effect.

meanings.definition: The state of being small in number or amount
meanings.sent1: The teacher emphasized the importance of the fewness of mistakes in the assignment.
meanings.sent2: The beauty of the garden lies in the fewness of flowers blooming.
meanings.sent3: The fewness of people at the party made it feel exclusive.
meanings.sent4: The fewness of waves on the lake mirrored the calmness of the morning.
meanings.sent5: The fewness of pages in the book made it a quick read.
